languages.text: After removal, the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}Obstructed{/g} effect leaves {g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}Assisted{/g} until the end of combat

languages.text: Whenever the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} effect is removed from an enemy, that enemy suffers the {g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}promised death{/g} effect until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} effect is removed from an enemy, that enemy suffers the {g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}promised death{/g} effect until the end of combat.

Whenever the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} effect is removed from an enemy, that enemy suffers the {g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}promised death{/g} effect until the end of combat.

languages.text: Cada vez que se elimine el efecto {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} de un enemigo, dicho enemigo sufre el efecto {g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}muerte prometida{/g} hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} effect is removed from an enemy, that enemy suffers the {g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}promised death{/g} effect until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que se elimine el efecto {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} de un enemigo, dicho enemigo sufre el efecto {g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}muerte prometida{/g} hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: 每当敌人受到的{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}效果被移除时，该名敌人都会获得{g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}难逃一死{/g}效果，持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} effect is removed from an enemy, that enemy suffers the {g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}promised death{/g} effect until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 每当敌人受到的{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}效果被移除时，该名敌人都会获得{g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}难逃一死{/g}效果，持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Quand l'effet {g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}Obstruction{/g} affectant un ennemi se dissipe, ce dernier subit l'effet {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}Mort promise{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} effect is removed from an enemy, that enemy suffers the {g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}promised death{/g} effect until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Quand l'effet {g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}Obstruction{/g} affectant un ennemi se dissipe, ce dernier subit l'effet {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}Mort promise{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: Bir düşman, üzerindeki {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}engellenen{/g} etkisi ortadan kalktığında {g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}ant içilmiş ölüm{/g} etkisine maruz kalır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} effect is removed from an enemy, that enemy suffers the {g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}promised death{/g} effect until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Bir düşman, üzerindeki {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}engellenen{/g} etkisi ortadan kalktığında {g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}ant içilmiş ölüm{/g} etkisine maruz kalır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.

languages.text: Когда эффект {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}обзор заблокирован{/g} снимается с противника, он до конца боя получает эффект {g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}обещанная смерть{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} effect is removed from an enemy, that enemy suffers the {g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}promised death{/g} effect until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Когда эффект {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}обзор заблокирован{/g} снимается с противника, он до конца боя получает эффект {g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}обещанная смерть{/g}.
Когда эффект {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}обзор заблокирован{/g} снимается с противника, он до конца боя получает эффект {g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}обещанная смерть{/g}.

languages.text: 敵から{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害{/g} の効果が取り除かれるたび、その敵は戦闘終了時まで{g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}約束された死{/g} の効果を受ける。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} effect is removed from an enemy, that enemy suffers the {g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}promised death{/g} effect until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 敵から{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害{/g} の効果が取り除かれるたび、その敵は戦闘終了時まで{g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}約束された死{/g} の効果を受ける。

languages.text: Wird der {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}Gehemmt{/g}-Effekt eines Gegners entfernt, wird er bis zum Ende des Kampfes mit dem {g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}Versprochener Tod{/g}-Effekt belegt.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} effect is removed from an enemy, that enemy suffers the {g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}promised death{/g} effect until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Wird der {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}Gehemmt{/g}-Effekt eines Gegners entfernt, wird er bis zum Ende des Kampfes mit dem {g|f:d683469a1e0e45d48e72a5ed2811f1b0}Versprochener Tod{/g}-Effekt belegt.
